chara.textHome: My parents died when I was very young.@They got sick. Apparently, a failed business@venture was too much.
The stress got to them and, well...
With nowhere to go, I was taken to@the Azalea House orphanage.
It was there I met @Hazuki Yusa and Ayame Mikuri.
The three of us have been together@ever since.
Hazuki, Ayame, and myself...@Our personalities are so different.
Still, that's why we complement and@support each other so well.
I know our hearts beat as one...
I can feel it... It's coming from me, isn't it?
This great surge of magic...
My senses are amplified...
like I can see over much more@than I could before.
When I was taken into the orphanage's care,@of course I was afraid.
But a whole new life was lying in@wait beyond that fear.
The only option is to keep@overcoming and moving forward.
The director at the Azalea House treated@everyone fairly, and she was so kind...
I respected her from the bottom of my heart.
When I met her, and she brought@sunlight into my life...
it's fair to say I was saved.
So we meet again.
Don't you think that's something to cherish?
We can't take it for granted that@we'll live to see every new day.
I try to wake up as early as I can.@That way I can fit as much@as I can into each day.
Doing so feels like the best use@of one's time, don't you agree?
There are several faces I have in life,@and one is being a student.@I make sure to always attend classes.
I want to be a good role model.
I always fulfill my duties as a Magical Girl@around this time of the day.
It's important to search for@Witches as often as I can.
That's just a part of my routine now...
On days when I don't find anything on@my patrols, I head home rather than@search aimlessly.
It's important to save energy@for the next day.
You know, I keep a diary.
Seeing the pages fill up shows me@that I've survived another day.
I suppose, in a way, I feel the@need to make sure I'm still alive.
Surviving in this world is the most@important thing for us.
So let's move forward, without fear...
"I'll never lose."@That's something I can never say for sure.
But I certainly don't intend to lose.
Now, let's begin.
You need some tension during battles.
Especially with long-time partners.
You can't rely too much on each other, or@you'll make mistakes and ruin everything.
My only objective is to survive.
Not just me, though.
I have to make sure Hazuki@and Ayame survive too...
It's not that I don't like crowded places...
I just prefer things quiet.
I wonder if I've unknowingly@cut myself off from the world...
The basic principle of shopping is@to buy quality goods at a low price.
Buying something without comparing@the price with other shops is@foolish and impulsive.
At home, my main job is paperwork@and managing our assets.
I don't just look after the money.
I also make investments.
It's natural for people to have@things they aren't good at.
That's why I take pride in learning to cook.
But I'm going to keep it a secret from@Ayame and Hazuki for a while...
Yes, believe it or not it tasted so@good, it'd make you faint...
No, that's not right.@I have to face reality.
But I'm at a complete loss right now...
I wasn't able to live with my real family.
However, I had people who treated me@as if we were a true family...
I'll never forget those times...
I like point cards.
Checking how many points I have@saved up and such... Like this... @
Hehe...heehee!
Oh no, I was laughing out loud...
Just stay there and let me finish you off...
We're going to survive, just watch…
I keep my eyes fixed on@the road ahead of me.
Yes... I guess that'll do.
Keep moving forward... It's all we can do.
My name is Konoha Shizumi.
Hazuki, Ayame, and I have been@moving from place to place,@but now we live in Kamihama.
This is a pretty interesting place.
Yes... At this rate,@I know I can reach new heights.
Becoming strong is the only way to survive.
That's how I've made it this far.
We won't be stopping here...
We'll keep pressing forward.
Hazuki can strike up conversation with@anyone... People might assume she's just@answering quickly and thoughtlessly,@
but she thinks her actions@through very seriously.
Ayame's the sort who will do something@on a whim as soon as it enters her mind.
She's so rambunctious that no one other@than Hazuki and I can keep her in check...
She's such a sweet, innocent girl.
